item.name: Authenticating method v1
item.description:
APIs to manage the Authenticating requests

This endpoint allows you to add a word to the list.
It's a really useful endpoint, and you should play around
with it for a bit.
<aside class="notice">We mean it; you really should.😕</aside>

request.description: <aside class="notice"> Method to authenticate yourself in the api, it is necessary to use some of its functions</aside>
